kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.msg: Connect to DB using : pymysql.connect(db='RPAdb', user=***, passwd=***, host='127.0.0.1', port=3306, charset='utf8mb4')
kw.doc: Creates a database connection using the DB API 2.0 ``db_module`` and the parameters provided. Along with listed commonly used arguments (`db_name`, `db_host` etc.) you can set any other DB module specific parameters as key/value pairs.

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
INSERT INTO products (description,quantity,unit,unitprice,vatPerc,varTot,priceTot,invoiceNr) VALUES ('Installation Services', 5, 'h', 60,24,72,372,1);
kw.doc: Executes the ``sql_string`` as a single SQL command.
